EmailTemplate.description: To be used in order to communicate the cancellation of review to GFA in case review has not been performed yet.
EmailTemplate.name: Cancelled Financial Review
EmailTemplate.subject: IFAP Case: {!Case.CaseNumber} Cancelled financial review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear PwC,
Please be informed that the financial review for IFAP case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been cancelled.
The reason for the cancellation is: - XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
Kindly acknowledge receipt of this information by replying to this email.
Thank you.
